text: @Hoosiers1986 @realDonaldTrump Laid off a year after he took office! New job during the Covid19  chaos. As a Vet I really do feel he loves this country and the people. I started donating to his re election campaign. As far as I am concerned we are doomed if the (Star Wars.. Democrats) Get in!
